summary: THE DRIVERS SIDE AND PASSENGER SIDE DOOR HANDLES ARE BROKEN. TO EXIT THE VEHICLE YOU HAVE TO PULL THE LOCK AND DOOR HANDLE AT THE SAME TIME.  ON PASSENGER DOOR SIDE NOW I AM UNABLE TO UNLOCK THE DOOR FROM THE OUTSIDE.   THIS SAME PROBLEM IS OCCURRING ON MY WIFE'S FORD FUSION 2011.   THIS CAN BE A VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION IF YOU HAVE TO EXIT THE VEHICLE IN AN EMERGENCY.
